bibl.title: In Praise of Nonsense.
Classical Mediterranean Spirituality. Egyptian, Greek, Roman
bibl.author: Miller, Patricia Cox

bibl.note: Traite de l'utilisation des lettres de l'alphabet dans les papyrus magiques. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 58 (1987) No. 1801.
Miller Patricia Cox, In Praise of Nonsense.
A.H. Armstrong (Ed.), Classical Mediterranean Spirituality. Egyptian, Greek, Roman = World Spirituality. 15 (London, 1986) pp. 481-505.
